containers.containerContent: Introduction

There's never been a better time to capitalize on the substantial sales, earnings and growth potential Baxter offers you through our high-margin, high-profit portfolio of Infusor Disposable Ambulatory Systems.
This tool was specifically designed to arm sales teams with the resources to:
Elevate the value of the Infusor portfolio
Position the portfolio effectively in the marketplace
Build long-term equity for the Infusor brand
Drive a competitive advantage on every sale

New Homechoice Claria APD System from Baxter

Now Baxter takes the Homechoice
cycler to the next level
The Homechoice Claria APD system is integrated with the Sharesource connectivity platform, that offers complete, secure data transfer and allows you to manage device programs remotely.
Homechoice Claria APD System
New features

At first glance, the cycler itself may look quite familiar –
it’s what’s inside that makes all the difference.
View new features
200% larger screen improves visibility compared to the original Homechoice cycler
Legible from multiple angles
2-line display eliminates the need for alternating messages
Larger font
8 new languages added (41 total)
2-way communication allows clinic to monitor treatment data and adjust device programs remotely
No need to wait for patients to bring in paper records
Store up to 4 device programs
Access up to 30 days of treatment data via the dashboard
Unlimited access to a patient’s treatment data history within reports
Sharesource Connectivity Platform
Transforming APD from within
The connectivity of the Sharesource platform supports much more than accurate data and proactive therapy decisions – it means patients may feel more secure in performing therapy at home.
Provide more timely patient care – make more proactive therapy decisions
Save clinic time – improve efficiencies
CONNECTIVITY PLATFORM
Provide more timely patient care – make more proactive therapy decisions
Remotely view patient treatment data from a web browser:
On-demand access to data allows you to intervene in a more timely manner – ultimately having more control over your patients’ therapy
Remotely create and edit a device program:
Update your patients’ therapy as needed to provide more timely care – no need to wait for an office visit to intervene
Set clinic level flag alerts:
Ensures your clinic focuses on important clinical events
Save clinic time – improve efficiencies
Remotely view patient treatment data from a web browser
Remotely create and edit a device program
Set clinic level flag alerts
CONNECTIVITY PLATFORM
Provide more timely patient care – make more proactive therapy decisions
Save clinic time – improve efficiencies
Automated patient treatment data collection:*
Ensures accurate patient treatment data collection; eliminates manual entry of treatment data, reducing administrative burden on patients and clinic
Comprehensive treatment reporting:

Allows you to aggregate both patient and clinic treatment data to see the bigger picture more easily; also serves as treatment verification for payers (you have solid proof of treatment for reimbursement purposes)
Remote technical service:
Allows Baxter to troubleshoot devices in a more timely manner – fewer device swaps saves time for the patient and clinic
Remote firmware upgrades:
Software updates occur without a device swap, eliminating hassle for both the patient and clinic
Automated patient treatment data collection
Comprehensive treatment reporting

* After a treatment, the next time the patient powers the machine, the treatment data from the dialysis device automatically uploads to the Sharesource portal and is available for viewing.  The time taken will vary, depending on connection speeds and the amount of information to be transferred.
CONNECTIVITY PLATFORM + CASE STUDY*
Name:
Karl
Age:
Life stage:
Retired carpenter, married, lives on the outskirts of the city, neither he nor his wife drive
Diagnosis:
Chronic kidney disease, diabetes
Clinical assessment:
Needs to start on dialysis within 1-2 months
Karl’s priorities and concerns:
Doesn’t want to be a burden to his family
Not familiar with the Internet, computers, new technology
Wants ample time for family and hobbies
Has to use public transportation which can be challenging
How the Homechoice Claria APD system addressed Karl’s needs:
Home-based, flexible therapy and treatment schedule alleviates transportation concerns and allows him time to pursue hobbies
User-friendly Sharesource platform further simplifies treatment with automatic data transmission†
Device programs can be adjusted via the Sharesource platform by his nephrologist
24/7 access to a technical service helpline further boosts his confidence<sup>‡</sup>
An issue arises:

Karl’s nurse discovers red flags after logging into the Sharesource platform to review his treatment data: flag indicates Karl finished PD therapy early and performed less cycles than prescribed. She asks that he come in for a checkup to ensure no further issues have arisen.
How Karl’s issue is resolved:
View red flags
Review treatment data
Device program change

At his appointment, Karl’s nephrologist reviews Karl and low day time ultrafiltration observed in Sharesource records. For therapy adequacy he prescribes Extraneal (icodextrin). The device program change is made remotely via the Sharesource platform, so it’s ready for Karl’s next therapy session.
Karl feels supported by the clinical staff in their ability to proactively address his needs and he feels more confident in his ability to stay on PD.
* Hypothetical case study

† After a treatment, the next time the patient powers the machine, the treatment data from the dialysis device automatically uploads to the Sharesource portal and is available for viewing.  The time taken will vary, depending on connection speeds and the amount of information to be transferred.
‡ Contact your Baxter representative to learn if 24-hour technical service is available in your market.
New Homechoice Claria APD System from Baxter

Homechoice Claria APD system
with the Sharesource platform
BENEFITS
Clinic Benefit
Enables remote patient monitoring and device program changes
May increase confidence to prescribe APD to more patients
Patient Benefit
May allow more patients to receive benefits of APD therapy
Service & Support

Here for you.
Here for your patients.
The support patients need to succeed*
Delivery & Inventory Services
On-Call Support
SWAP Program
Training Programs
Baxter Travel Club
A team designed around you*
Medical Support & Education
Clinical PD Consulting

Combination for Success

Four reasons to rely on Baxter PD.
One comprehensive portfolio.
41 languages
Pediatric capability
Improved display visibility
Exclusive 2-way communication
Remote access to patient data
Proactive device program management
Remote technical service and firmware upgrades
Integrated supply ordering*
Only non-glucose solutions and low glucose therapy combinations
Only non-glucose solution for the long dwell
Only optimal solution for the short dwell
Only PD solution proven to improve patient comfort

With our comprehensive service and support, you and your patients
have access to a network of knowledgeable Baxter experts at every
therapy touchpoint

† Not all solutions are available in all markets.

PRESCRIBING INFORMATION
Click to view prescribing information.
REFERENCES AND CITATIONS
1 Data on file. Baxter International Inc., Deerfield, IL.

2 Davies SJ, Woodrow G, Donovan K, et al. Icodextrin improves the fluid status of peritoneal dialysis patients: results of a double-blind randomized controlled trial. J Am Soc Nephrol. 2003;14(9):2338-2344.
3 Paniagua R, Ventura MD, Avila-Diaz M, et al. Icodextrin improves metabolic and fluid management in high and high-average transport diabetic patients. Perit Dial Int. 2009;29(4):422-432.
4 Bro S, Bjorner JB, Tofte-Jensen P, et al. A prospective, randomized multicenter study comparing APD and CAPD treatment. Perit Dial Int. 1999;19:526-533.
5 Mactier RA et al. Bicarbonate and bicarbonate/lactate peritoneal dialysis solutions for the treatment of infusion pain. Kidney Int. 1998;53:1061-1067.
